categories: Category:Unidentified Jedi of the New Jedi Order

nodes.text: A male individual of the Codru-Ji species trained as a Jedi in the New Jedi Order sometime after the year 40 ABY. The four-armed man had fair skin and long, brown hair that he wore loose. On one occasion, the man was cornered by a BL-39 interrogator droid, but he fought back wielding a white-bladed lightsaber shoto in each of his upper hands.

This individual was created for the Legacy Era Campaign Guide, a sourcebook for the Wizards of the Coast Star Wars Roleplaying Game, but he went unnamed in the sourcebook, receiving only an illustration and mention in its accompanying caption.
